name: Kensington Ci65m Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: [Flexible design and soft grips ensure comfort and control, Performance Optical Technology 1000dpi optical tracking provides superior precision and responsiveness, 3 buttons plus a scroll wheel make it easy to navigate documents or Web sites, Snap-in Ultra Slim receiver stores easily inside the mouse and automatically turns it off when stowed, Battery level indicators signals when you at 40% usage left, then 10% giving you ample time to replace. Battery life expected up to 1 year of use on 2 AA batteries (batteries included)]
